document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Ambrysus Stål from the Central Mexican Plateau and new state records for species of the genus in the country (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha Naucoridae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Ambrysus Stål from the Central Mexican Plateau and new state records for species of the genus in the country (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha Naucoridae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ambrysus colimanus Polhemus & Polhemus 1981
: Pan-Pac. Entomol., 57: 397–399.
Published records . Mexico : Colima , Jalisco ( Polhemus & Polhemus 1981 ; Reynoso-Velasco & Sites 2018a , 2018b , 2019b ).

New state records .
Mexico : Michoacán , Nayarit , Oaxaca
.

Distribution . The hitherto known distribution of this species included only a few localities from the adjacent states of Colima and Jalisco . At present, we know this is a species distributed exclusively in Mexico , along the central and southern portions of the western coast ( Fig. 5 ). The species exhibits a typical neotropical distribution that includes the narrow area of the Pacific Lowlands biogeographic province, from Nayarit south to Oaxaca . The shown apparent disjunct distribution is most likely due the lack of collecting localities along the coast in the state of Guerrero (see Reynoso-Velasco & Sites 2019b ). The author has collected in numerous places along the coast of Chiapas and has not found
A. colimanus
; thus, it is probable that the species is not distributed south of the Tehuantepec Isthmus.

Material examined .
